error.message: Class Drupal\Tests\twigjs\FunctionalJavascript\TwigjsTestBase extends deprecated class Drupal\FunctionalJavascriptTests\JavascriptTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\FunctionalJavascriptTests\WebDriverTestBase instead
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to twigjs.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
